title: OCE Players Wanted for Team Battles
body:
Hello OCE,

We are looking for people to play 5v5 Normal and Ranked Games with. We want people who want to learn and grow with other players, tho we do ask you are around level 25+ to start with. We all started somewhere, some earlier and some later than others, but gaming is gaming. 

People make mistakes, in RL and on the Rift, so keeping cool and helping your team learn is just as important as listening to someone more experienced trying to coach you. Keep you cool, no one wants to hear bickering.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}} 
We do expect that you're Humble in victory and Graceful in defeat. 

You will have at least 1 main for 2 lanes of your choice. This will help to make forming teams easier and Teamspeak is obviously high encouraged, but not a prerequisite unless playing in ranked games.

Currently we have around 5 people, but we all can't be on at the same time. You know that RL thing gets in the way, so it would be good to have a pool to choose from. There is not official recruitment method, just hope in TS and introduce yourself. We don't bite I promise.

==================
**Teamspeak**
ts3.srcshosting.com.au
===================
This is public, so feel free to use it.

See you on the rift!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

Kind Regards,

Highway
ADC - {{champion:22}}  Mid - {{champion:99}}  Top - {{champion:23}}

replies.body:
Hey All,

There is no joining as such, just jump on Teamspeak and introduce yourself.

25+ just means that you will grasp the basic concepts of the game, have a little experience and be able to enjoy your time playing with everyone else. 

The Teamspeak is....
ts3.srcshosting.com.au  (no password)
it is free and public, so invite your friends to use it! (if it fills up I will apply for a non profit licence)

You can also add me (qldhighway) or Bloodspiller to your friends. Blood started a little club, and called it QQTIME **rolls eyes** but its just a hangout really as TS is preferred.

We have found about 7 people so far which is AWESOME! you know who you are! However more are welcome as I previously mentioned sometimes people are previously engaged with RL!

We might start something up down the track and get some official handles and website and stuff, but that is later as it takes away from actual gaming time. (We already have talent to set all this up if it comes to it.)

So jump on, say hi and play a few rounds with your fellow OCE players!

See you on the RIFT!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Regards,

Highway
I would also be keen. How do we join?
whats the level of skill ill join!

>whats the level of skill ill join!

.

>tho we do ask you are around level 25+ to start with.
I'd be keen for some fun than!
